Control Name: 14.2.3 Technical review of applications after operating platform changes
Control Statement: When operating systems are changed, business critical applications shall be reviewed and tested to ensure there is no adverse impact on organizational operations or security

control_attributes.Clause_Category: 14.2 Security in development and support processes
